recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
cookingInstructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add bell pepper, carrot, and broccoli. Stir fry for 5–7 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil.
Cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
cookingInstructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Add basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze if desired.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
cookingInstructions: Preheat grill to medium heat.
Drizzle salmon and asparagus with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side.
Grill asparagus for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Serve with lemon slices.

recipes.name: Tuna Poke Bowl
cookingInstructions: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions.
In a bowl, combine tuna, soy sauce, and sesame oil.
Arrange rice, tuna, avocado, and cucumber in a bowl.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Gluten-Free Pancakes
cookingInstructions: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk milk, egg, sugar, and vanilla.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, mix until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour batter onto pan, cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden.
Serve with syrup or fruit.

recipes.name: Gluten-Free Chicken Tenders
cookingInstructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Dip chicken strips in almond flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs.
Place on a baking sheet and spray with cooking oil.
Bake for 20–25 minutes, turning halfway.
Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Vegan Chickpea Curry
cookingInstructions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic, sauté until soft.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and coconut milk.
Simmer for 10–15 minutes.
Season with salt.
Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Vegan Tofu Stir Fry
cookingInstructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add tofu and cook until golden.
Add bell pepper, carrot, and snow peas.
Stir in soy sauce and ginger
Cook for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or noodles.
